metadata.title: CVE-2017-10908 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
H2O version 2.2.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice in the server via specially crafted HTTP/2 header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10908` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

h2o - 2.2.4+dfsg-1build1
libh2o-evloop0.13 - 2.2.4+dfsg-1build1
libh2o0.13 - 2.2.4+dfsg-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: h2o package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.4+dfsg-1build1').
